title: System Design Level 9 â€” News Feed / Timeline
intro: This level focuses on designing a basic social media news feed.
points: Clarify requirements: post, follow, like, show personalized feed.
Understand fan-out on write vs fan-out on read idea.
Consider feed storage models (per-user feed, aggregated on demand).
Use caching heavily for hot feeds and posts.
Think about ranking, pagination and real-time updates (concept).
